subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Javier Acevedo of Colombia won the fourth stage of the Tour of Utah, but the defending champion Levi Leipheimer retained the overall lead with one day left in the race.
snippet: Javier Acevedo of Colombia won the fourth stage of the Tour of Utah, but the defending champion Levi Leipheimer retained the overall lead with one day left in the race.
